price: 46. Tama Yallak meesitaah kaah yaqunxee mari, Diggah usun Qhiyaamah Ayro sinni Rabbit yangooroweeh, Diggah usun cisab kee galtoh kaä fanah gacoonu waanam Asmatah yaaxigen.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَظُنُّونَ أَنَّهُم مُّلَٰقُواْ رَبِّهِمۡ وَأَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ رَٰجِعُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yaẓunnūna annahum mulāqū rabbihim wa-annahum ilayhi rājiʿūna
